thread.title: North vs South divide in Rugby World Cup quarterfinals
thread.title_full: North vs South divide in Rugby World Cup quarterfinals

title: North vs South divide in Rugby World Cup quarterfinals
text: > Sports North vs South divide in Rugby World Cup quarterfinals New Zealand's Charlie Faumuina, left, during the Rugby World Cup Pool C match between New Zealand and Georgia at Millenium stadium in Cardiff, Wales, Friday, Oct. 2, 2015. It’s possible that the beards have been bigger, bushier and more commonly worn at the Rugby World Cup in 2015 than they were four years ago, when a trio of Canadians made waves as the “The Beardos”. (AP Photo/Frank Augstein)
